title: 'Inflamm-aging' causes loss of bone healing ability in the elderly

title_detail.value: 'Inflamm-aging' causes loss of bone healing ability in the elderly

summary: Increases in chronic inflammation -- not the passage of time -- is the main reason why injured bones do not heal as well with age.

summary_detail.value: Increases in chronic inflammation -- not the passage of time -- is the main reason why injured bones do not heal as well with age.
